# Raisedash

> Continuous compliance and safety for freight trucking carriers. Raisedash is Vanta for Trucking - strengthening safety and security of companies in freight logistics with modern AI-powered solutions.

Raisedash provides comprehensive tools designed to enhance safety, compliance, and efficiency in freight logistics operations. It provides best possible user experience. It's not like legacy old software. We change everything.

## Products

- [Shift (Driver Onboarding)](https://raisedash.com/products/raisedash-shift): Driver onboarding platform with streamlined LMS solution for efficient driver training and compliance
- [PTI Inspections](https://raisedash.com/products/raisedash-pti-inspections): Digital Driver Vehicle Inspection Reports (DVIR) and pre-trip inspection tools
- [Vertex (Freight Tracking)](https://raisedash.com/products/raisedash-vertex): Real-time freight tracking with automated arrival alerts
